question: Identify trends in social media engagement across different companies in the technology sector over the past year.

subtasks.task: Gather social media engagement metrics for technology companies within the past year.
Filter technology companies based on their industry from the CompanyInfo table.
Analyze and compare engagement metrics (likes, comments, shares) across different social media platforms for the filtered technology companies.
Identify any notable trends or patterns in social media engagement metrics and present findings.
